alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hillsborough County through 515 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riverview, or near Fish Hawk, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brandon, Fish Hawk, Riverview, Greater Sun Center, Palm River-Clair Mel, Boyette, Lithia Springs State Park, Bloomingdale, Gibsonton, Alafia River State Park, Progress Village, Wimauma, and Mango. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
